meanings.definition: To be a part of a whole
meanings.sent3: The puzzle piece constitutes the missing link.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness constitutes the foundation of our friendship.
meanings.sent5: The heart constitutes the essence of life.

meanings.definition: To make up or form something
meanings.sent1: The colors constitute a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: His jokes constitute the highlight of the party.
meanings.sent4: Laughter constitutes the music of happiness.
meanings.sent5: Each drop of rain constitutes the melody of nature.
